duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle customer service inquiries and problems associated with the servicing of company’s client base.
Answer all basic and routine customer contacts as well as more complex customer problems and/or complaints.
Utilize computer applications to provide professional service.
Proactively excel at working within a team and being ready, willing, and able to take on extra work and help others whenever needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma minimum. College degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
